title: Never tell this madman what he can and can't do
author: Howisthisaname

comments.author: Howisthisaname
comments.body:
I found this gem randomly and I couldn't believe my eyes. While it's not exactly a review, it was too good to pass up and I have no idea where else to post it. Everyone said it couldn't be done. Even the seller. They were wrong.

Here's the question if anyone wants it:

https://www.amazon.com/forum/-/Tx1OVGC4YIS6VWX/ref=ask_dp_dpmw_al_hza?asin=B009PJV6KK

comments.author: duhduhduhdiabeetus
comments.body: Above and beyond! Stick to your guns, folks!

comments.author: The_Stoic_One
comments.body: So many [*neigh*](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=D0nCnS-UJLs) sayers answering that question.
